page.title: 15CORNISH GRANITE QUARRY
page.content: The granite which is taken from Hantergantick is a closed grain high quality silver grey Cornish granite with light pieces of mica. Hantergantick also import granite, Vicking Silver Blue from Sweden and Valencia Pink from Spain.They have seven different surface finishes which are ideal for paving stones or buildings.The granite from Hantergantick has been used in the construction of many famous London landmarks such as The Tower Bridge,The New Post Office Block,The Commercial Union Office Block and The Eddystone Lighthouse which isn't in London and I expect other places aswell.About a year ago a frigate called The Jupiter knocked a nine tonne piece of granite from The London Bridge which men from Hantergantick mended.
